title: 820-3330 no CPU VCORE
message:
hello friends,

i am just working on a 820-3330 board. got it from client, he had it in a apple service for repair and after that it was in boot loop.
i tryed to start asd but after some tryes it was dead only green light and one tick fan spin.

I replaced bios, then smc then U1800. After that I had fan-spin. after that i replaced the original bios back.

all power rails are present only PPVCORE_S0_CPU and PPVCORE_S0_AXG_REG missing.

macbook starts with fan spin and led is all time on.

PPCPUVCCIO_S0_REG is present, CPUIMVP_VR_ON has 3.3V

PPVIN_S0_CPUIMVP = 12.53V

PP5V_S0_CPUIMVP_VCC present

CPU_VIDSCLK is there

TON resistors both are ok (180K) voltage on one side 12.53, other 0,53V, compared with a working 3330, same values.

to be shure swaped with a working 3330 the u7400 but no change, the working one works with u7400 from the problem board.

need some help please.

title: 820-3330 no CPU VCORE
message: If you replace PCH now you need a bios with clean ME region.....

title: 820-3330 no CPU VCORE
message:
could you help me to clean the me region in the bios?
here is the original reading

[url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/rqd28gica3e4gw4/S06735_3330_original%20-%20Kopie.bin?dl=0[/url]

title: 820-3330 no CPU VCORE
message:
Could be anything really. Any history to this board, water?
ME region has nothing to do with Vcore at this moment.

title: 820-3330 no CPU VCORE
message:
no watermarks.
after power on no display, as well extern, nothing, but working.
after a lot of new starts possible to get a picture but only for a while

then the macbook was in apple service to repair. 

after that there was a boot loop until the long dong

then it came to me, I tempered the board for 48 houres

after some tryes to start up it dosnt started at all

I replaced SMC, found under SMC 2 popcorn effects. but not shure if it was from me from lift off.

I tryed with another bios chip from a known working 3330. I tryed the bios chip from tha bad board on the working board, got fan spin on the working machine. 

I put back the bios chip on the not working board and replaced the U1800. after that i got fan spin with all power rails present only missing PPVCORE_S0_CPU and PPVCORE_S0_AXG_REG

I found out that pin 7 (CPU_AXG_SENSE_R´) from R7400 hat in Diode mode 0.670 and on the working board is 0.015. I lifted U7400, No change.
I reflowed the CPU. After that Pin 7 was 0.015 like it should be.

I soldered back u7400 but still nothing.

thats the history until now.

title: 820-3330 no CPU VCORE
message:
pin 47 has a big diff. I still found another working board and there has pin 47 463. So that could be ok.

just again doublechecked, 3.3V is present on that pin 47, the eneable pin.

title: 820-3330 no CPU VCORE
message:
any idea where to start diagnostic?

what happens after CPUIMVP_VR_ON has 3.3V, which signals or clocks have to be there that the u7400 starts work?


I get on pin 6 U5400 only 0.07V, the good board shows 0.22V, on U5410 pin 6 I get on the bad board 0,19V that should be ok
but U5400 ? only 0.07V on Pin6 ?

Pin4,5 have 12.55V, pin 3 has 3.3V, I replaced U5400 but same values...

title: 820-3330 no CPU VCORE
message:
I just touched the U1800 and damn so hot, burned my finger :-). 

Is it a good idea to replace it again? If its hot because of a short of any rail so why i have a fan spin?
